messages.message:
@Jeff sorry yea this is an ugly brute-force option, in lieu of proper code updates in the ICC / deployment bits for sandboxes. It just indiscriminately deletes the first N tags it finds until it's down to <=299 tags (just the hack logic I had to use for the sake of unblocking everyone).

If there are environments that fail on missing expected images, they'll need to be redeployed to get a new image built, tagged, and pushed.
